<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770201849</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Two Thumbs Up </string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zwei Daumen Oben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Deux Pouces Vers le haut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dois Polegares Acima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Due Pollici In su</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δύο αντίχειρες επάνω</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Dos Pulgares Para arriba</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students will reflect on their experience working through the Smoking Zine.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer reflektieren sich auf ihrer 
Erfahrung, die durch das rauchende Zine arbeitet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants réfléchiront sur leur expérience
fonctionnant par le Zine de tabagisme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes refletirão em sua experiência que 
trabalha com o Zine fumando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi rifletteranno sulla loro esperienza 
che funziona con lo Zine fumante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές θα εξετάσουν την εμπειρία τους 
εργαζόμενος μέσω του καπνίσματος Zine.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes reflejarán en su experiencia que 
trabaja con el Zine que fuma.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
